## Stochastic Matrices

### Symmetric Stochastic Matrices

```{r}
# Set seed
#set.seed(23)
# Set parameters
M <- 7
# Generate matrix
P <- RM_normal(M, normal_args = c(0,1))
if(bloud){P}
```

```{r}
# Set parameters
B <- 100
steps <- 5
# Evolve batch
evolved_batch <- run_batch(P, B, steps)
```

```{r}
eigen_frame(P)
```


```{r}
# Find final elements
last <- time_array(evolved_batch, at_time = 25)
```
